testcase.name: LB-1132 : Verify "Go1Percent" logo, carousel images, carousel caption and the footer message (TC-337)
LB-1133 : Verify that tag line with text "Get 1% Better Everyday" is displayed (TC-338)
LB-1134 : Verify that carousel image changes while clicking on carousel button (TC-339)
LB-1136 : Verify that specific text between login options is present on the web page (TC-341)
LB-1135 : Verify that login page heading contains text "Sign in to Go 1%" is displayed (TC-340)
LB-1137 : Verify that clicking on the Microsoft logo redirects to the Microsoft login page (TC-342)
LB-1138 : Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an alert message is displayed (TC-343)
